item.title: France detains captain of suspected Russian ‘shadow fleet’ tanker seized in Mediterranean - AP News
item.description: France detains captain of suspected Russian ‘shadow fleet’ tanker seized in Mediterranean AP NewsFrance detains Indian captain of suspected shadow fleet tanker ReutersCrackdown on Shadow Fleet Escalates With Seizure of Ship Carrying Russian Oil The Wall Street JournalCaptain of suspected Russian shadow tanker in French custody BBCFrance’s navy intercepts an oil tanker in the Mediterranean sailing from Russia Yahoo
